Play Bloxd.io - Master the Art of 3D Parkour

Challenge yourself in this thrilling 3D parkour game where precision jumping and quick thinking are your keys to victory!

About Bloxd.io

Bloxd.io is an engaging multiplayer 3D parkour game that combines skill-based gameplay with competitive elements. Navigate through challenging courses, compete with players worldwide, and test your parkour abilities in this exciting online adventure.

Game Features

  • Smooth 3D graphics and responsive controls
  • Multiple challenging levels and obstacles
  • Real-time multiplayer competition
  • Cross-platform gameplay support
  • Regular updates and new content

How to Play

Use your keyboard to control your character: WASD or arrow keys for movement, spacebar for jumping. Time your jumps carefully and maintain momentum to reach the finish line. Compete against other players and try to achieve the best time on each course.
